titleStmt.title: A golden chaine of divine aphorismes written by John Gerhard Doctor of Divinitie and superintendent of Heldburg. Translated by Ralph Winterton fellow of Kings Colledge in Cambridge
Loci communes theologici. English
titleStmt.author: Gerhard, Johann, 1582-1637.
Winterton, Ralph, 1600-1636.
Cecil, Thomas, fl. 1630, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [for Richard Royston, London] by [Thomas Buck and Roger Daniel] the printers to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: With an added title page, engraved, "The marrow of diuinitie or A golden chaine of diuine sentenses .. London printed for Ri. Royston in Ivie-lane 1632" (the date changed in pen to 1633), signed "T. Cecill sculp.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
